alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 2:51PM PST until January 31 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 13 inches, with greatest accumulations above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and allow extra following distance while driving. Use caution while traveling, and allow extra time to reach your destination. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
